title: Calories in an 8oz Sirloin Steak
meta_description: Discover calories in an 8oz sirloin steak, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per 100g basis, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: Top sirloin steak, lean only, trimmed of visible fat, cooked (broiled or grilled), no added oils, salts, or marinades; 8oz = 227g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, fat trim, cooking method, grade (choice/prime), and portion accuracy. Consult labels or USDA data for specifics.

quick_answer.text: An 8oz cooked sirloin steak provides ~468 kcal and ~68 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in an 8oz sirloin steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 468 kcal for an 8oz lean, cooked sirloin steak.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 8oz sirloin steak?
faqs.a: About 68 g of protein, making it a high-protein option.
